methods: abstract void onSpanAdded(Spannable text, Object what, int start, int end) This method is called to notify you that the specified object has been attached to the specified range of the text.

abstract void onSpanChanged(Spannable text, Object what, int ostart, int oend, int nstart, int nend) This method is called to notify you that the specified object has been relocated from the range ostart…oend to the new range nstart…nend of the text.
abstract void onSpanRemoved(Spannable text, Object what, int start, int end) This method is called to notify you that the specified object has been detached from the specified range of the text.
